Self-sovereign identity means that the identity of a person (or device or organization) is neither dependent on nor subjected to any other power or state. Learn more about the principles of #SSI. #DigitalIdentity #DecentralizedIdentity https://t.co/IJlMXP27ZD https://t.co/ucKYOQ52en

If ‚ÄúWeb Standards‚Äù is L1
‚ÄúAuth Standards‚Äù L2
‚ÄúOpen Source Blockchain‚Äù L3
Then #DID is Level 4
Stay tuned to know how Govts acrossüåéusing #SSI for simpler safer & faster ecosystem in future
